quote: I find it fascinating – all the leptons, bosons, hadrons – oh my!
We could do something with this data. It made us feel that we were scientists for a day.
The task of analysing the data was definitely challenging but very engaging, we didn't really have a clue at the start but we didn't want to stop by the end!
Seeing how the theory we learnt from the morning lectures came to life  while analysing data from the CMS detectors was truly fascinating.
The students overwhelmingly said they enjoyed the experience.
Masterclass was one of the most challenging and rewarding academic experiences I have ever had.
